short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily look up what time it is in another timezone when scheduling meetings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scheduling meetings across timezones sucks.

Use this extension to figure out what time to suggest in their timezone.

Just type in what time you want and where they are, and this handy extension will tell you what time to suggest in their local timezone.
